title: Glasswall ICAP - Management UI
description: The Management UI in the Glasswall ICAP Program, a dockerised expressJS server written in Typescript and Typescript-React and running in an AKS cluster. Also hosted on dockerhub under the name: glasswallsolutions/icap-management-ui.

title: Rebuild API - Automated Performance Testing
description: A Minimum Viable Product for demonstrations of the Automated Performance Tests on Glasswall's Rebuild API.

title: Glasswall Engineering
description: Documentation and resources for users of Glasswall Solutions' products.

title: Glasswall Rebuild for Email
description: Integral part of the Cloud development team; working in .NET, docker and Kubernetes.

title: jdmcserver
description: One project I started with a friend recently, jdmcserver, is a Minecraft server hosted in an AWS EC2 instance. As well as a static frontend which communicates with an API hosted on AWS API Gateway. The API connects Lambda functions, which toggle the running status of the EC2 instance, and expose the serverâ€™s details.

title: This Website!
description: This CV is actually a React/Webpack static site.  I wanted to version-control the web pages for the CV, but also the content. I needed a way to quickly make a change and see it propogate instantly on the frontend. I decided to go with GitHub, in order to make it open. An added bonus is a free proof-read; if a friend or potential employer spots a mistake or wants to suggest an improvement, they can create a pull request on this repository! :)
